com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.common.http

Class HttpProxyParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.common.http.HttpProxyParameters

  • public class HttpProxyParameters
extends Object
    Houses and validates HTTP proxy parameters.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs HTTP proxy parameters with default configuration.

      Creates HTTP proxy parameters with the specified parameters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpProxyParameters

        public HttpProxyParameters()
        Constructs HTTP proxy parameters with default configuration.

      • HttpProxyParameters

        public HttpProxyParameters(String host,
                   int port,
                   String username,
                   String password,
                   String domain,
                   String workstation,
                   boolean preemptiveBasicProxyAuth)
        Creates HTTP proxy parameters with the specified parameters.

        The host and port must be specified together.

        The username and password must also be specified together and must accompany the host and port.

        The domain and workstation must be specified together and must accompany the username, password, host, and port.

        Parameters:
        host - the proxy host
        port - the proxy port
        username - the proxy username
        password - the proxy password
        domain - the proxy domain (NTLM authentication only)
        workstation - the proxy workstation (NTLM authentication only)
        preemptiveBasicProxyAuth - whether the proxy should preemptively authenticate
